text: Indonesia participated in the 1986 Asian Games held in Seoul, South Korea from September 20, 1986 to October 5, 1986. This country was ranked ninth with 1 gold medal, 5 silver medals and 14 bronze medals with a total of 20 medals top.1986 Asian Games medal tally ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !
